item.title: Social Media Clip Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are an independent film company with a focus on unique and diverse cinematic experiences. We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media Content Creator to help us enhance our online presence. The primary role will be to create engaging and dynamic reels for our social media platforms based on our extensive film catalog.

Responsibilities:

    View and digest a variety of films to grasp their core themes and elements.
    Produce compelling short video reels suitable for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook.
    Collaborate with our marketing team to align each reel with the film's tone and audience engagement strategies.
    Deliver multiple reel versions for iterative feedback and refinement.
    Ensure all content meets platform-specific specifications and maintains high quality.

Requirements:

    Proven track record in video editing and social media content creation.
    Strong understanding of current social media trends and the needs of different platforms.
    Ability to work independently and efficiently, meeting deadlines with consistent output.
    Excellent communication skills and responsiveness to feedback.

Offer:

    This is a freelance position with the potential for ongoing projects.
    Competitive compensation based on experience and the quality of work.

If you are passionate about films and skilled in crafting engaging digital content, we would love to hear from you.


Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Graphic Designer, Video Editor & Social Media (Full-Time Job | Personal Growth Brand) - Upwork
item.description:
Please note that we're looking for someone who's after a full-time role and not simply a freelance position.

Pay: $29,000USD-$34,000.00USD per year (to be discussed and confirmed)

Schedule: Monday to Friday (with some weekends)

--

Job Details:

Are you ready to embark on a journey that's not just a career but a calling?

At Success Insider, we're not just a company; we're a movement dedicated to personal growth, mental health and self-development.

We're on a mission to empower individuals worldwide through groundbreaking online trainings focusing on mindset, personal development, and mental health.

What You'll Get to Do:
- Craft and share engaging Tik Tok style content on our social media platforms.
- Design cool digital stuff like certificates, ad banners, and learning materials.
- Edit videos that pack a punch, enhancing our course materials.
- Dive into the world of videography and photography - maybe even join us on international filming adventures abroad!
- Plan and schedule social media posts that captivate our audience.
- Assist with managing our many communities on Facebook.

Who We're Looking For:
- A people person who's all about making a positive impact. We're all about connecting heart to heart.
- A driven individual who's eager to chase big dreams and contribute to our grand mission.
- Someone who's a joy to work with, radiating positivity and - awesome vibes.
- A challenge lover who doesn't know the meaning of "I can't."
- A born leader who inspires and takes accountability.
- Comfortable with working remotely, as our team is spread worldwide.

What Matters to Us:
- Attitude over everything. We believe the right mindset can turn potential into greatness.
- A love for learning. If you're eager to grow, you're in the right place.
- Commitment for the long term. We value loyalty and integrity highly.
- Strong English skills to communicate effectively in our global setting.
- A dedication to hard work, ready to go the extra mile.

Perks of Being with Us:
- Insider access to how a thriving online business operates.
- Personal development opportunities, including seminars and access to a treasure trove of courses.
- Performance-based bonuses that celebrate your success.
- Collaborate with an A-team, where excellence breeds excellence.
- Be part of a grand mission to improve the quality of people's lives.


Hourly Range: $14.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Illustrator, Instagram, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Illustrator, Instagram, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a skilled video editor for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
So, This is my channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkQjP85QVYQQAxkbqpJsYsg
I need a very skilled video editor to level up my content in order to compete with bigger channels in my niche.

example:
https://youtu.be/JQFQ4BHL8_g?si=Kiz6TTFb0mr-y9iT

We're looking for someone with the following requirements
- Must be fluent in English
- Fast turnaround time (3-5days)
- Fast response times
- Good understanding of YouTube retention (important)
- Ideally has expertise in storytelling (important)
- Add clips to give more context to the video
- Capacity for long-term work
- $100 PER video

When applying, please provide us examples of previous work and YouTube videos you’ve worked or you will automatically be disqualified to work with us.

Start the proposal with (I READ IT ALL) so I know you've read everything.


Budget: $100

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Video Editor for iPhone Ads and Social Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to help us create engaging iPhone ads and short form social content. As a video editor, you will be responsible for cutting and editing iPhone videos to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing content. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software, strong attention to detail, and a creative eye for visual storytelling.
  Responsibilities:
  - Cut and edit iPhone videos to create ads and short form social content
  - Ensure the final output aligns with the brand's guidelines and objectives
  - Collaborate with the marketing team to understand the project requirements and deliver high-quality videos within deadlines
  Requirements:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
  - Attention to detail and ability to work on tight deadlines
  - Previous experience in creating ads and social content for iPhone is a plus
  If you are a talented video editor with a passion for creating captivating content, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor Reptile Convention shorts 24 Hour Turn Around - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking for a talented Videographer/Video Editor to craft two engaging promotional videos from footage of a recent reptile convention. This project requires creating one 1-minute video and one 30-second short, blending promotional content with creative visuals to capture the essence of the event.

Responsibilities:

Video Editing: Craft one 1-minute and one 30-second promotional video using provided footage. Ensure each video is engaging, informative, and captures the excitement of the reptile convention.
Creative Input: Apply creative editing techniques to make the videos stand out, using effects, transitions, and other visual elements that appeal to reptile enthusiasts and potential visitors.
Optimization: Prepare and optimize the videos for various platforms, including social media and the event’s website, ensuring they are formatted correctly for each channel.
Collaboration: Work closely with our marketing team to align the videos with our promotional goals and branding guidelines.

Footage will be provided

Hourly Range: $22.00-$38.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Colorist needed for simple interview footage - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a pro colorist that for the following project:

Technical:
Shot in Canon Clog 3 with Cinema Gamut (I have conversion LUTs if you need them).

Video:
One person interview with two camera angles (medium and close) on tripods. Same lighting and set in all the shots.

Requirements for final video:
1 - Overall grade to look a little more warm and welcoming, as this is an "About Us" video for a company that will send it to potential customers.

2 - Skin tones looking natural and not as pale/pink

There are some b-roll clips from a drone that are already in Rec709.



Budget: $50

item.title: Documentary Style Video for Youtube regarding a Tech Company - Upwork
item.description:
This is a video about a Tech Failure. I need it to be in documentary style (Business/Tech Documentary). I will be providing a comprehensive guide with a script including relevant links to references.  I want the video to be little dynamic to have a good retention. The platform is for Youtube.

I need the delivery within 2-3 weeks time.

If we get through this successfully, There will be more work coming in.

It's better if you have done any business documentaries previously. But if not any documentary is fine if you can show your previous work.

If you think you are the ideal person. Please Apply soon!


Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics

It's better if you have done any business documentaries previously. But if not any documentary is fine if you can show your previous work.

If you think you are the ideal person. Please Apply soon!

item.title: Graphics Designer for business - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a high quality social media / graphics designer. Someone to work with on a long-term basis for my growing agency. Need someone who specializes in graphic design, creating banners, social media posts, and video editing is also a plus. You need to be able to speak, write, and create content in English fluently. Please provide some samples with some of your best work. I attached some examples below as well. The plan is that the right candidate will be provided with as much work as they can handle, not instantly, but in the future, as it might take some time to start off. But I think its important to get our relationship started off first, and see if you are a right fit for the agency.

item.title: Video Editor for Meal Prep Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging and visually appealing video edits for advertising our meal prep company. As a video editor, you will be responsible for taking raw footage and transforming it into compelling videos that effectively promote our products and services. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, strong storytelling abilities, and the ability to work with tight deadlines.
    

Skills required:
    • Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    • Knowledge of color grading, video effects, and transitions
    • Ability to work with different video formats and resolutions
    • Strong understanding of storytelling and visual communication
    • Excellent time management and organizational skills
    • Attention to detail and a creative mindset
    • Experience in creating videos for advertising or marketing purposes is a plus
    

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can deliver high-quality edits within the given timeframe. Join our team and help us showcase our meal prep services through captivating videos!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Video Editor For Editing Course Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
I am looking for an editor to help me edit pre-existing course videos.

I have around 120 pre-existing course videos that I had recorded around 3 years back which need to be re-edited with better quality video and new audio

Each of these videos contain a whiteboard/screen share and small rectangular area on the bottom right corner where we have the face  of the person explaining the video.

We need to superimpose the rectangular area with the new camera feed and the new audio keeping the screen share part intact as it is.

The audio is 95-98% same and in the correct order.

This does not involve adding fancy cuts or animations, but simpler video editing involving synchronizing new audio with the old audio and superimposing new face video feed over the old video feed.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://youtube.com/@serioushistory
https://www.youtube.com/@ChatHistory
https://www.youtube.com/@TrustMeBroOfficial

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:15 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India

item.title: Video Editor Wanted - Upwork
item.description:
I want to make a YouTube video. I have recorded two videos on my smartphone for this.

First, I want you to join the two video clips. The first video contains the introduction and the second has information about being a digital nomad. Please delete the introduction part of the second video (I made a mistake in this) and replace it with the first video.

Next, I want you to create a talking head video in which my head is only in a very small portion of the screen. I always want my head to be small. I want you to create bullet points and headings that outline the main points that I’m making in the video.

I’ve attached visual examples below from YouTube channels with a similar design.


Budget: $5
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Georgia
